html: (8) To thy name, and to the remembrance of thee . . .—The “name” of God is, as always, that which reveals His character and will. Those who have waited for Him in the path of His judgments long for a fuller manifestation of that character. Comp. the prayer, “Father, glorify thy Name,” in John 12:28 . In the next verse the prophet identifies himself in spirit with the longing expectation of the time that precedes the final manifestation.
